Name: Academic
Description: You devote your efforts to the pursuit of knowledge.

OptionLists.Name: Archivest
OptionLists.Description: You store and maintain transhumanity’s collective knowledge.

OptionLists.Name: Researcher
OptionLists.Description: You find secrets hidden within the data.

OptionLists.Name: Professor
OptionLists.Description: You educate the next generation of transhumans.

Name: Covert Operative
Description: You are skilled at accessing places you don’t belong.

OptionLists.Name: Smuggler
OptionLists.Description: You ghost your way past habitat security restrictions.

OptionLists.Name: Spy
OptionLists.Description: You infiltrate organizations to ferret out secrets or destroy them from within.

OptionLists.Name: Thief
OptionLists.Description: You have your way with security systems in the cause of redistributing wealth.

Name: Enforcer
Description: You’re a thug, whether for hire or for a dedicated cause.

OptionLists.Name: Autonomist Militia
OptionLists.Description: You’re part of a volunteer group that defends your hab and handles conflict resolution.

OptionLists.Name: Cartel Goon
OptionLists.Description: You serve the criminal whims of your syndicate’s leaders.

OptionLists.Name: Gang Member
OptionLists.Description: You and your gang band together for safety and weight of numbers.

Name: Explorer
Description: You walk on alien worlds and see things others wouldn’t believe.

OptionLists.Name: Crew
OptionLists.Description: You handle the grunt work of exploration: base camps, field tests, and support.

OptionLists.Name: Scout
OptionLists.Description: You specialize in survey and recon.

OptionLists.Name: Search and Rescue
OptionLists.Description: You seek out gatecrashers that are lost or in trouble.

Name: Face
Description: You excel at convincing others, even when it is not in their best interests.

OptionLists.Name: Con Artist
OptionLists.Description: You deceive others for fun and profit. Or you work in advertising/marketing. Same thing.

OptionLists.Name: Fixer
OptionLists.Description: You work your connections to make sure everyone gets what they are after.

OptionLists.Name: Negotiator
OptionLists.Description: You work deals and deploy leverage to get your way.

OptionLists.Name: Astrobiologist
OptionLists.Description: You are fascinated with alien life and what makes it tick.

OptionLists.Name: Bio Tinkerer
OptionLists.Description: You dabble: body mods, neogenetics, gene therapies, smart drugs, and more.

OptionLists.Name: Uplift Specialist
OptionLists.Description: Your veterinary science background extends to smart animals and uplifts.

Name: Hacker
Description: Software heeds your beck and call.

OptionLists.Name: Blue Team
OptionLists.Description: You specialize in defending systems from intruders.

OptionLists.Name: Digital Intruder
OptionLists.Description: You penetrate systems to liberate their secrets.

OptionLists.Name: Hacktivist
OptionLists.Description: You hack hypercorp/gov sites and reverse engineer tech in support of social causes.

OptionLists.Name: Detective
OptionLists.Description: You attempt to solve crimes.

OptionLists.Name: Ego Hunter
OptionLists.Description: You track down escaped and wanted egos.

OptionLists.Name: Journalist
OptionLists.Description: You bring important subjects to the public’s attention.

Name: Medic
Description: You have a background in medicine.

OptionLists.Name: Morph Tech
OptionLists.Description: You tweak and modify biomorphs and assist with resleeving.

OptionLists.Name: Paramedic
OptionLists.Description: You provide emergency medical services.

OptionLists.Name: Physician
OptionLists.Description: You are a general practice doctor with a few unusual specializations.

OptionLists.Name: Memeticist
OptionLists.Description: Whether a viral marketer or culture hacker, you specialize in infectious ideas.

OptionLists.Name: Psychosurgeon
OptionLists.Description: You are a mindshaper, helping people sculpt their mental palaces.

OptionLists.Name: Psychotherapist
OptionLists.Description: You help people cope with mental trauma and improve their cognitive skills.

Name: Scavenger
Description: You scrounge through wrecks and ruins, seeking value in destruction.

OptionLists.Name: Junk Dealer
OptionLists.Description: You make a living by resurrecting abandoned tech.

OptionLists.Name: Salvage Crew
OptionLists.Description: You strip abandoned ships and habs for anything of value.

OptionLists.Name: Zone Stalker
OptionLists.Description: You raid quarantine zones for artifacts.

Name: Scientist
Description: You excel at convincing others, even when it is not in their best interests.

OptionLists.Name: Field Scientist
OptionLists.Description: You use your training in the life sciences to study exoplanets.

OptionLists.Name: Physicist
OptionLists.Description: You excel in the hard sciences.

OptionLists.Name: Xeno-Archeologist
OptionLists.Description: You investigate the remains of dead alien civilizations.

Name: Soldier
Description: You deploy violence — or the threat of it.

OptionLists.Name: Bodyguard
OptionLists.Description: You place yourself between your client and potential harm.

OptionLists.Name: Mercenary
OptionLists.Description: You’re a gun for hire.

OptionLists.Name: Operative
OptionLists.Description: You’re an assassin, street ronin, special ops, or general badass.

OptionLists.Name: Artifex
OptionLists.Description: You’re a nano-engineer.

OptionLists.Name: Hab Tech
OptionLists.Description: You keep the life support running.

OptionLists.Name: Roboticist
OptionLists.Description: You operate drones and repair synths.
